headline: DoorDash Robot Dot And Senior Programs Raise New Investor Questions
summary: DoorDash (NasdaqGS:DASH) has introduced an autonomous delivery robot called Dot, aimed at handling orders in suburban areas where driver availability has been tight. The company is also supporting the bipartisan Delivering for Rural Seniors Act to expand food access for older adults, building on its existing Project DASH efforts. For investors watching NasdaqGS:DASH, Dot adds a new tool to DoorDash's logistics toolkit as it continues to operate across restaurant delivery, convenience, and...
